Technical Support:

[] Pause iLert Check for {{TECHNICALNAME}}.customervoice360.com

[] Check out Routing plugin
[] Set MySight site to "Suspended The site is unavailable to users." on Tableau Server(s) manually

  • Frankfurt (PREPROD2, https://mysight-preprod2-de.customervoice360.com )

  • Frankfurt (PROD, https://mysight-prod2-de.customervoice360.com )

  • US_AWS_Prod (US_AWS_PROD, https://mysight-prod-us.customervoice360.com )

[] or use helper tabchecksuspend_v1.sh

helper log

[] Check Last login / ignore if Tivian Access has been active
echo "SELECT account,login_date,login_failed FROM login_log ORDER BY login_date DESC LIMIT 15;" | efslogin

  • Customer:

  • Tivian:

[] Add globis comment

u {{INITIALS}} {{DATE}}: This installation has been soft deleted. Final purge: {{DATE}} \({{CASEID}}\)

[] Add InstallationInfo to installation NFS

echo "{{INITIALS}} {{DATE}}: This installation has been soft deleted. Final purge: {{DATE}} {{CASEID}}" >> InstallationInfo.txt

!Handover to Sysadmins!
